price: al agua hirviendo, y luego ardan en el fuego.
arabic: فِي ٱلۡحَمِيمِ ثُمَّ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يُسۡجَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fī al-ḥamīmi thumma fī al-nāri yus'jarūna
